statements: SELECT * FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE parent_factor_id IS NULL;
SELECT factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT factor_name, parent_factor_id FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_name LIKE 'E%';
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_id = 1;
SELECT factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors WHERE parent_factor_id IS NULL;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%risk%' ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE parent_factor_id IN (3, 6, 9) AND factor_id > 5 ORDER BY factor_name ASC;
SELECT factor_name, parent_factor_id FROM RiskFactors WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT risk_factor_name, weight FROM RiskFactors ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT id, risk_factor_name FROM RiskFactors ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE id = 1
SELECT risk_factor_name, weight FROM RiskFactors WHERE weight > 0.5 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT risk_factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors WHERE risk_factor_name LIKE '%risk%' ORDER BY risk_factor_name
SELECT * FROM Dependencies WHERE risk_factor_id = 1 AND dependent_risk_factor_id = 2
SELECT rf.risk_factor_name, d.dependent_risk_factor_id FROM RiskFactors rf INNER JOIN Dependencies d ON rf.id = d.risk_factor_id
SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_id = 1;
SELECT factor_id, description FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name = 'Factor A';
SELECT factor_id, factor_name, description FROM risk_factors ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dependencies WHERE factor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM risk_factors ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT factor_id, description FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM dependencies WHERE dependency_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT factor_id1, factor_id2, relation_type FROM factor_relations WHERE factor_id1 = 1 OR factor_id2 = 2;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT id, name FROM RiskType ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT description FROM RiskFactors WHERE id = 3;
SELECT dependency_name FROM RiskDependencies WHERE dependent_factor_id = 2;
SELECT factor_id, weight FROM RiskRelationships WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT * FROM RiskDependencies WHERE dependent_factor_id = 3;
SELECT factor_id, type_id, weight FROM RiskRelationships WHERE weight > 0.5 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT factor_id, type_name FROM RiskRelationships JOIN RiskType ON RiskRelationships.type_id = RiskType.type_id;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors JOIN RiskDependencies ON RiskFactors.id = RiskDependencies.dependent_factor_id;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT factor_name FROM risk_factors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, factor_name FROM risk_factors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dependencies WHERE factor_id = 2 AND dependent_factor_id = 3;
SELECT factor_id, type_id FROM factor_mapping WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT factor_id, dependent_factor_id FROM dependencies WHERE factor_id = 1 AND dependent_factor_id = 2;
SELECT factor_name FROM risk_factors JOIN factor_mapping ON risk_factors.id = factor_mapping.factor_id WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT factor_name, assessment_score FROM risk_factors JOIN risk_assessment ON risk_factors.id = risk_assessment.factor_id WHERE assessment_score > 50 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT type_name FROM factor_types WHERE id IN (SELECT type_id FROM factor_mapping) ORDER BY id ASC;
